item.description:
hi Trailblazers join us for some good old music at the Seacoast Science Center and listen and dance to the Jumbo Circus Peanuts Band,  If you've been there, you know how much fun it is and how stunning the seaside setting. If you have not been there, your life is incalcuably the drabber for it. It's the nearest experience you'll get in the 21st century to the Beatles at Shea Stadium. Just bring a chair or blanket, pack up the kids if you got 'em, park the ol' Porsche SUV for free out front, have a cold draft beer or glass of wine and a veggie pate de campagne pita wrap with organic goat cheese and truffle oil from the onsite vendors, and just luxuriate

Make sure you bring a lawn chair or a nice blanket, some food to share and some freindly friends!

If you get lost or need to find me, my number is: 603-312-6735

See you there!

peter

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Jumbo Circus Peanuts Band- Seacoast Science Center
